sources.title: 1967 - Gentleman Killer - Anthony Steffen's stylish quest for justice - Western film
sources.description:
A dandy gambler plays a deadly game of revenge in a lawless border town!
When a ruthless Mexican colonel targets U.S. soldiers in a disputed territory, a sharp-dressed stranger arrives to settle scores with style.

metadata.Plot: A border-town became the subject of heated political turmoil between the US & Mexico when a Mexican bandit starts killing as many US soldiers as he can.
metadata.Actors: Anthony Steffen, Eduardo Fajardo, Silvia Solar
